parameters.name: BaselineClassKey
parameters.description: The key of the baseline type.

parameters.name: BaselineNameKey
parameters.description: The key of the baseline name.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: ScanRange
parameters.description: The types of the assets that are scanned.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the baseline risk item. Valid values:

*   **0**: unfixed
*   **1**: fixed
*   **2**: pending verification
*   **3**: fixing failed
